name: GetAttachmentOfEarningsByAttachmentOfEarningsId
description:
__Activity name :__ GetAttachmentOfEarningsByAttachmentOfEarningsId

Get the details of an attachment of earnings record

attachmentOfEarningsId.description: The unique identifier of a record

Authorization.description: A valid Bearer token for authorizing the request.

Accept.description: The accept header is used to influence what type of output is returned and in most cases the version of the output

$ul: **version**
**obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
**messages**
**content**
**beneficiary**: Information regarding the beneficiary coresponding with the bank account number
**city**: City name of beneficiary
**name**: Name of the beneficiary
**creditor**: Information regarding the creditor

**priority**: The priority of a creditor within the type of creditors. 0 is the highest priority followed by 1 etc. Priority dictates the order in which creditor receives their payment.  The amount of earnings that can be used for payments can be limited (see attachment-exempt threshold).  The system will then divide the available earnings starting with the creditor with the highest priority.  If all available earnings are spend all other attachments will not receive payment until the time that earnings are available to meet them.
**type**: The type of creditor. A preferent creditor has priority over non-preferent creditors.
**key**
**value**
**description1**: Description 1. Both description field values will be a line in the (unstructured) description of the SEPA file.
**description2**: Description 2. Both description field values will be a line in the (unstructured) description of the SEPA file.
**descriptionPayslip**: This value is shown on the payslip to identify the attachment.
**endDate**: The end date of the record
**fixedPaymentPerPayrollPeriod**: Set a fixed sum to be payed every payroll period.
**iban**: International Bank Account Number (IBAN). Only IBAN without spaces are accepted.
**id**: The unique identifier of an object (GUID/UUID)
**startDate**: Start date of this record
**totalAmount**
**owed**: The total amount to be paid to the creditor
**paid**
**inApprovedPayrollRuns**: The total amount registerd in payroll run(s) with the status "approved".
**inOpenPayrollRun**: The total amount registerd in payroll run(s) with the status "open".
**version**
**obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
**messages**
**content**
**message**
**message**
